source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Apple WatchKit - Essential Training
items.headline: This course teaches everything you need to develop compelling Apple Watch Apps using the WatchKit Framework & Swift.
objectives_summary: Become a Master in Developing Compelling Apps for Apple Watch using the WatchKit Framework
Weekly updates to keep you engaged with latest features.

items.title: Intelligent Mobile Application Development with TensorFlow
items.headline: A practical guide to using TensorFlow and creating efficient Deep Learning models for your mobile apps
objectives_summary: Learn the art of building models using pre-built models and scripts.
Use artificial intelligence in your models to build your first smart iOS/Android application.
Deploy TensorFlow models on iOS and Android platforms.
